resources.string: Q1: Callbacks created on launch are: onCreate(), and onStart().
Q2: When the home button is pressed, the callbacks: onPause() and onStop() are called.
Q3: When resuming, onRestart() and on Create() are called.
Q4: When rotated, the app calls onPause(), onStop(), onDestroy(), onCreate(), onStart(), and onResume() in that order.
